actions.name: Salt Cure
actions.description: Effect: On hit, all valid targets are afflicted with Salted for 5 activations. Salt Cured creatures take a tick of HP damage at the end of each of their activations. Steel-type and Water-type creatures take 2 ticks of HP damage at the end of each of their activations instead. Salt Cure's duration cannot be refreshed; and the effect ends when the duration ends, the creature is switched out, Faints or combat ends.
